species.name: togepi
descriptions: A proverb claims that happiness will come to anyone who can make a sleeping Togepi stand up.
As its energy, it uses the feelings of compassion and pleasure exuded by people and Pokémon. It stores up happy feelings in its shell, then shares them out.
It is considered to be a symbol of good luck. Its shell is said to be filled with happiness.
Its shell is said to be stuffed with happiness that it shares with kindhearted people.
It transforms the kindness and joy of others into happiness, which it stores in its shell.

abilities.name: hustle
abilities.effect: Strengthens physical moves to inflict 1.5× damage, but decreases their accuracy to 0.8×.

abilities.name: serene-grace
abilities.effect: Doubles the chance of moves' extra effects occurring.

abilities.name: super-luck
abilities.effect: Raises moves' critical hit rates one stage.
